name: La Sol
description:
A short game, created in the Adventure Game Studio engine, as part of a monthly game-making competition back in 2011.

In this game you take on the role of a janitor, working somewhere aboard the manmade luxury resort La Sol, when something unexpected happens. With your world turned quite literally upside down, you must struggle to escape your submerged trap.

This "Special edition" of the game comes with all assets packaged with the game, so you can examine the game files, sprites and even the source code if you wish (viewing source code requires the use of the Adventure Game Studio -editor)
